name: Essations Naked Laid Edge Control
description:
Naked Laid Edge Control is an oil & grease free gel that is used to smooth and hold the stray edges of the hair straight, while leaving it soft, pliable, and with a naturally brilliant shine.  It is great as a spiking gel to assist in defining short spikey looks without a hard finish.  It can be used before curling for a complete boost in curl definition and direction control, or when the style is just about complete for a little extra definition in your finishing touches.  

It does not turn white, nor flake in your clients' hair.

4oz. jar.

Our Exclusive Brand, Rated Grade AAAAA, is 100% unprocessed premium quality virgin human hair cut and donated with cuticles all in tact. name: Indian Wavy Lace-front Human Hair Wig
description:
100% Indian Human Hair Glueless Front Lace Wig.
Standard options are 1b, wavy 120% density with medium brown lace and medium cap; if no specifications are noted, you will receive your wig with those specs.  

Hair Texture: Wavy

Hair Colors also available: 1B/#1/#2/#4

Density: Standard (120%)

Lace Color: Light Brown or Medium Brown (In Stock)

Cap Size: Medium (22-22.5 inches)  or Small (21-21.25 inches)

 Cap Construction: 3.5 Inch Handtied Lace Part In The Front, Adjustable Strap Lace At Back, Machine Wefts Back and  Combs On both sides.

You Can Part Your Hair To Any Direction You Like with the lace in front.  Knots are not bleached but you can create a Very Natural Hairline without bleaching. 

 Standard options are 1b, wavy 120% density with medium brown lace and medium cap; if no specifications are noted, you will receive your wig with those specs.

name: Hairfinity Vitamins - 30 day supply
description:
Hairfinity Hair Vitamins are natural vitamins that nourish your hair from the INSIDE OUT. 
Hairfinity contains ingredients which promote a healthy scalp, increased hair elasticity, increased hair strength, and more.

Hairfinity hair vitamins are formulated with essential nutrients for healthy hair growth. Our vitamins nourish your hair from the inside out. Haifinity has transformed the hair of women all over the world.

Directions: Adults, take two capsules per day. 
30 day supply (60 capsules per bottle). For all hair types.

More info:

name: Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Body Wave - Grade 4A
description:
Our New Virgin Brazilian Body Wave hair is a Grade 4A, higher quality hair than normal.  It is unprocessed and wefted into 100g bundles.
The only color available is 1B/Natural black; but you may lift to a #30 or #27. 
Available in lengths 8"-24".

Brazilian Hair is the most popular on the market right now. This hair is used diversely because of its softness, durability and density (thickness). This texture is easiest to blend with most ethnicities from some Caucasian textures to African American relaxed textures. Brazilian hair is extremely luxurious and very soft with a lot of body and natural shine with a low to medium luster.

There are 3.5oz in each bundle. For a full head approximately 2-3 bundles are needed for your sew in weave. 
4A is Med. grade Virgin hair, may lift to color #27/30.

Virgin hair - Refers to hair that is completely unprocessed, and intact.  To qualify as virgin hair, it must meet rigorous standards including: not been permed, dyed, colored, bleached, chemically processed in any way. Virgin hair is the hair you want if you are going to dye the hair.  Virgin hair is likely to have a few strands of gray or white hair since it is in its natural color and has not been dyed.  This is a natural characteristic of 100% virgin hair. It usually comes in a color range around #1b to #1 a natural dark brown to black.  

Please see our pictures on IG: SugarSheaShears 
We also offer salon services and weave installs.
